response.overview: GCN's Simon Richardson heads to Koblenz to find out more about a brand that has reigned victorious in the world’s biggest races and a champion of quality, value and innovation: Canyon.  Simon finds out how Canyon designs and builds their bikes, as well as meeting founder Roman Arnold to learn how his small family business became a global market leader.  He gets an exclusive, access-all-areas, tour of their state of the art factory,  meets Canyon athlete, and Triathlon legend; Jan Frodeno. We also hear from one of downhill mountain biking’s most exciting talents, Tahnee Seagrave, and Mathieu Van der Poel gives an exclusive interview revealing his close relationship with Canyon.
response.title: Canyon: The Inside Story
